name: Mara: Sh0rk of Justice
description:
Mara: Sh0rk of Justice is a top-down adventure game made over a long weekend with  GB Studio. Guide Mara through the spooky dungeon in order to find all of its secrets. Seek out the secrets of the spooks! Defeat the evil mage! Solve the puzzles! Find the items of power! It's up you to save us all, Mara!

The source code is on GitHub: Xe/mara-sh0rk-of-justice.

Controls for the web embed: A -> Z B -> X Start -> Enter D-Pad -> Arrow keys
